alert.note: Alert for Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 01 at 3:04PM MST until March 02 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Feet and Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Feet. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact travel over La Veta Pass, especially overnight into Thursday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft
